pages.text: The prototype of the Staff in EMCWorld is the Terra Blade, but there are some differences. $(br2) The Staff's beam can pass through entities, which means you can attack multiple entities at once. $(br2) To avoid hitting teammates or friendly entities, you can adjust which entities the beam will hit (requires keybind adjustment).

Entities hit by the Staff will have an additional 0.25 seconds of invincibility frames. $(br2) The Staff only consumes EMC when it hits an entity, and the EMC cost is higher compared to other weapons.
